response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to both of us. After careful consideration and evaluation of its worth, I propose to sell this exceptional item to you for $950,000. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also allows me to recoup my investment while ensuring you receive a high-quality asset at a fair price. I believe this offer presents an excellent balance between value and cost, making it an attractive proposition for you. Should you decide to proceed, I am confident this product will meet and exceed your expectations. Please let me know your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
